result.eng: I was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ba ḃreá liom a ḋul ċuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
